description:
A broke Momoka discovers a treasure map?! How does the Survival Game Club`s treasure hunt end?! National idol Yammy suddenly gained weight?! The Survival Game Club helps her diet, but Momoka`s intentions... The Survival Game Club gets lost in the jungle. A mysterious creature watches them. A magnificent battle to the death begins between the Survival Game Club and their invisible enemy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chasseurs au trésor – L`Idole triste – SAVP
Treasure Hunter / Idol of Sadness / Survival VP
Treasure Hunter / Kanashimi no Idol / Sa VP
トレジャーハンター / かなしみのアイドル / さVP
